overview: The pre-game workout. Football-playing homos and homophobes add some new rules to the game, and then proceed to break them, in this twist on the ol' pigskin-toss. Raunchy director Jeff Kincaid is back with more hot sex than you can shake your dick at. Kyle McKenna gets more than man-handled behind bars. These boys want nothing more than big dicks and tight ends!
title: Balls in Play
